Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, Shape

    public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    Circle class represents circles. Circle class implements Shape interface's methods.
